A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was great. The ones hating on it are the ones who had their theories dashed over and over again. Theories since 2015. Go in without expecting your theories of who Rey is\, who Snoke is\, what Luke's up to etc etc to be true\, and you'll be fine. Build the movie up in your head to be a certain way and you'll have a bad time and write up a salty (no pun intended) review.
